column4: i need some help getting dvd decrypter to work on wine http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=2587   i dont get how it says im suppose to switch windows to nt
need to set your OS to nt4 i believe
look in winehq app database, tells you all
well for imgburn you have to select a different aspi mode, and for dvd dec, it "used" to be NT4
